org.kiji.rest.util
Class KijiInstanceCache

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.rest.util.KijiInstanceCache

public class KijiInstanceCache
extends Object

A cache object containing all Kiji, KijiTable, and FreshKijiTableReader objects for a Kiji instance. Handles the creation and lifecycle of instances.

Constructor Summary
KijiInstanceCache(org.kiji.schema.KijiURI uri)
          Create a new KijiInstanceCache which caches the instance at the provided URI.
 
Method Summary
 List<String> checkHealth()
          Checks the health of this KijiInstanceCache, and all the stateful objects it contains.
 org.kiji.scoring.FreshKijiTableReader getFreshKijiTableReader(String table)
          Returns the FreshKijiTableReader instance for the table held by this cache.
 org.kiji.schema.Kiji getKiji()
          Returns the Kiji instance held by this cache.
 org.kiji.schema.KijiTable getKijiTable(String table)
          Returns the KijiTable instance for the table name held by this cache.
 void invalidateTable(String table)
          Invalidates cached KijiTable and KijiFreshTableReader instances for a table.
 void stop()
          Stop creating resources to cache, and cleanup any existing resources.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

KijiInstanceCache

public KijiInstanceCache(org.kiji.schema.KijiURI uri)
                  throws IOException
Create a new KijiInstanceCache which caches the instance at the provided URI.

Parameters:
uri - of instance to cache access to.
Throws:
IOException - if error while opening kiji.
Method Detail

getKiji

public org.kiji.schema.Kiji getKiji()
Returns the Kiji instance held by this cache. This Kiji instance should *NOT* be released.

Returns:
a Kiji instance.

getKijiTable

public org.kiji.schema.KijiTable getKijiTable(String table)
                                       throws ExecutionException
Returns the KijiTable instance for the table name held by this cache. This KijiTable instance should *NOT* be released.

Parameters:
table - name.
Returns:
the KijiTable instance
Throws:
ExecutionException - if the table cannot be created.

getFreshKijiTableReader

public org.kiji.scoring.FreshKijiTableReader getFreshKijiTableReader(String table)
                                                              throws ExecutionException
Returns the FreshKijiTableReader instance for the table held by this cache. This FreshKijiTableReader instance should *NOT* be closed.

Parameters:
table - name.
Returns:
a FreshKijiTableReader for the table.
Throws:
ExecutionException - if a FreshKijiTableReader cannot be created for the table.

invalidateTable

public void invalidateTable(String table)
Invalidates cached KijiTable and KijiFreshTableReader instances for a table.

Parameters:
table - name to be invalidated.

stop

public void stop()
          throws IOException
Stop creating resources to cache, and cleanup any existing resources.

Throws:
IOException - if error while closing instance.

checkHealth

public List<String> checkHealth()
Checks the health of this KijiInstanceCache, and all the stateful objects it contains.

Returns:
a list health issues. Will be empty if the cache is healthy.
